text: In next question we will check that student will pass or fail
We have given marks of student
If marks are greater than 33 then we know that student will pass
But if marks are less than 33 then student will fail
Now if I have to write this condition with the help of ternary operator then how will I write?
First we will make a variable marks
In which we will store our marks
Now when we will compare this marks with 33
If marks are greater than or equal to 33
We will ask compiler what happened
In that case we will print pass
If not then we will print fail
And where we will store this?
We will take the status of student
String status
We will store this in status and then print
What status is running in report card or we can also give it report card name
And we will print rc
So how to read this?
We have to read this question mark that we are asking a question to compiler
And we have to read this dot or colon if not then
Now let's write code for this
Ternary operator is very simple code
We have to write a single line
Let's define the variable
Suppose marks are 67
In this case what will ternary operator do?
Let's make a string variable
Report card
In report card we will compare marks
If marks are greater than or equal to 33
We will ask
In that case we will store pass
If not then we will store fail
And then we will print our report card
Let's save and run
So for 67 it was printed pass
And here
If we would have missed one number
If it would have been 31
Then it would have been print fail
